text.value: When did you assume your position in this area (Month/Year)
Goal Of Project: 1. To promote community-level One Health security
1.1 The project has enhanced working across animal and human sectors to fight epidemics in human and animal populations
2. Disease surveillance; the project has supported
2.1. Complementing participatory engagement of local communities
2.2. Enhanced early disease detection at community level
2.3. Enhanced timely reporting of disease events from community level
2.4. Enhanced linkage of health events from community level to the existing surveillance systems
2.5. Enhanced prompt response to disease events at community level
2. Disease surveillance; the project has supported
2.6. Enhanced timely reporting of disease events to primary health care facility/LFO
2.7. Enhanced timely reporting of disease events to district level
2.8. Enhanced prompt feedback/response from primary health care facility/LFO
2.9. Enhanced prompt feedback/response from district level
2.10. Enhanced prompt feedback/response from region level
2.11. Enhanced prompt feedback/response from national level
3.1. Sufficient training on use of digital technology (AfyaData) was provided to Community Health Reporters
3.2. Training of existing Community Health Reporters was an effective strategy
3.3. Sufficient training on use of digital technology (AfyaData) was provided to human health staff
3.4. Sufficient training on use of digital technology (AfyaData) was provided for livestock health staff
3.7. Trained stakeholders gained new knowledge and skills
4.1. Digital tools (AfyaData) used easy to install, use and navigate
4.2. Digital tools (AfyaData) used support data capture and storage
4.4. Digital tools (AfyaData) used support provision of feedback at health facilities/LFO offices
4.5. Digital tools (AfyaData) used support provision of feedback within communities
4.6. Data collected through AfyaDAta were relevant to community based disease surveillance
4.7. Data collected through AfyaDAta were relevant to national disease surveillance
4.8. Need to revise the amount of data collected by the tools
6.1. Mechanism used to disseminate it was good
7.1 Enhance networking/collaborations among sectors responsible for human and animal health
Opinions, challanges, type & number of disease outbreak from 2017 etc
